description: If Bon Jovi had a baby with Selma Hayek, if he was lucky, he'd grow up to look like Franco. Deep blue eyes, a mane of long shiny hair, a face down right gorgeous and all wrapped up in a tall, lean muscled package.He just moved to the United States and if it was possible for him to get hotter than just looking at him, hearing that sexy accent out of that perfect smile made us want to rip his clothes off.Fortunately, he was happy to naked and show off that his daily workouts have done his body good - damn good.  He's the kind of guy who knows that unwrapping the package is half the fun and he sure knows how to work it. When it comes to pounding out a huge load of his homemade margarita mix...he sure knows how to work that too!
title: Bueno Buenos Aires
